overview_of_class:
Class Composition

Class instruction in techniques of composition including:


  1. Writing for solo instruments.

  2. Writing for small ensembles.

  3. Composing for instruments and/or voices.

  4. Composing with simple electronics.

  5. Hands-on experimentation with sounds.
name: Class Composition
title: MUSIC MUS_COMP 311-2-20 Class Composition

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: This course is open to non-music majors.
